nodes.text: The Separatist Droid Army utilized a passenger airspeeder during the Clone Wars. An airspeeder was used by a T-series tactical droid during the Battle of Anaxes, but was later stolen by "Crosshair" as a getaway vehicle for the Clone Captain "Rex," ARC trooper CT-5597 "Jesse," and Clone Force 99 after they infiltrated the Cyber Center on Anaxes.
